amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute requires the Congress to provide for a balanced Federal budget by the year 2002; requires a three-fifths vote to run a budget deficit; requires a three-fifths vote to increase the public debt limit; but requires only a majority vote to increase taxes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute which is similar to the text of H.J. Res. 1 except that it does not include the provision to require a supermajority vote in the House and Senate to raise taxes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schaefer amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 293 - 139 (Roll no. 49).
